---
id: user-profile-update
title: "User profile update"

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/updateProfile"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API allows user profile to update information securely. The profile data is sent as encrypted or encoded data.
